user_story.i_want: propose amendments to our association's settings
user_story.so_that: make sure the constitution fits our needs

whens_list: I go to the amendments page
I fill in the organisation name with "Tea Club Mark II"
I fill in the objectives with "REALLY enjoying tea"
I choose "Absolute majority" for general decisions
I choose "Simple majority" for constitution decisions
thens_list: I should be on the voting and proposals page
I should see a proposal "Change organisation name to 'Tea Club Mark II'"
I should see a proposal "Change organisation objectives to 'REALLY enjoying tea'"
I should see a proposal "Change general voting system to Absolute majority: decisions need supporting votes from more than 50% of members"
I should see a proposal "Change membership voting system to Unanimous: decisions need supporting votes from 100% of members"
I should see a proposal "Change constitution voting system to Simple majority: decisions need more supporting votes than opposing votes"
I should see a proposal "Change voting period to 5 minutes"
